I'm a professor of biostatistics at the [Oslo Centre of Biostatistics and Epidemiology](https://www.med.uio.no/imb/english/research/centres/ocbe/){target="_blank"}, Department of Biostatistics, University of Oslo, working on causal inference and survival/event history analysis. I also hold a 20% position as researcher at the [Department of Method Development and Analytics](https://www.fhi.no/en/ab/departments-and-centres/method-development-and-analytics/){target="_blank"}, Division of Infection Control and Environmental Health, at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health, and serve as an associate editor for [Biometrika](https://academic.oup.com/biomet){target="_blank"} and [Statistics in Medicine](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/page/journal/10970258/homepage/editorialboard.html){target="_blank"}.

See also my [web pages at the University of Oslo](https://www.med.uio.no/imb/english/people/aca/jonmic/index.html){target="_blank"} and the pages of our [causal inference and survival analysis group](https://www.med.uio.no/imb/english/research/groups/causal-inference-methods/index.html){target="_blank"}.
